metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9186 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description: Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in the "legacy course files" and "file manager" modules in Moodle 3.1.2 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code by uploading a file with an executable extension, and then accessing it via unspecified vectors.

notes.Note: ebarretto> Moodle upstream does not believe it is a security vulnerability and the reporter did not followed up on requests from upstream to provide clarification

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
